name: Acid Breath
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character one rank away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 11) or suffer three wounds.
There are worse things than quicksand in the swamps of Markappal.

name: Alhana Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian • Seer • Genecourt
After Alhana comes into play, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a character, you may immediately put him or her into play, as long as you can follow all the normal rules for bringing that character into play. Otherwise, it is shuffled back into your deck.
Do not sleep... do not sleep tonight...

name: Amulet of Force
effect:
Order: Spend the Amulet to perform a +3 ranged strike.
Order: Discard the Amulet to perform a +5 ranged strike.
“Life is but a childhood. Death is ever after.” – Artheon

name: Anton Cyldragen
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Warlord • Unique
May start the game with wizards from other factions. Wizards joining your army suffer no loyalty penalty.
Spend React: Perform before equipping a wizard in your army with an item. The wizard is +2 levels for equipping this item.
Nothing is ever truly lost.

name: Attack of Opportunity
effect:
React: Play after a character in the 1st rank performs a ranged strike or casts a spell. If this fighter is in the 1st rank, the fighter targets the character with a melee strike.
“Go ahead, wizard. Flinch.” – Darian Windson

name: Avalanche
effect:
Dwarf • Blackstone Raider
Whenever Avalanche is targeting a Monster with a melee strike, add +5 to the die roll.
Ye fight w’monsters, aye? Then watch that ye do not become one.

name: Azamereth Flamekeeper
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Narawat
Spend React: Before a melee strike roll targeting Azamereth, Azamereth performs a melee strike targeting the attacker.
All flame is born in the Desert of Narawat. It is the beating heart of the world.

name: Ballista Crew
effect:
Nothrog • Siege • May not attack
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike that ignores any AC bonus from Armor, Shield, or Helm items. This ranged strike inflicts 2 wounds. Stun the Ballista Crew.
“That’s what I call a ‘critical hit’”. - Sethusk

name: Baroness Lucana
effect:
Deverenian • Ranger • Order of the Fourth Wind
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.
“I shall teach thee, Jack, what it is to be pierced by the storms of fate”

name: Basalt Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Basalt Gargoyle into play. If Basalt Gargoyle has one or more wounds, if does not become ready during the ready phase.
“…and the rocks themselves shall rise to your aid” – Hember’s Rune

name: Battle Rage
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, this fighter gains +1 ATK and suffers -1 AC. If the fighter is a Barbarian, he or she instead gains +5 ATK and suffers -2 AC.
“The Nothrog aren’t all bad. I can almost get along with the dead ones.” – Poison

name: Behlial
effect:
Elf Warlord • Unique • Seer
May start the game with clerics from other factions. Clerics joining your army suffer no loyalty penalty.
Order: Once per turn, look at the top five cards of your deck. You may return them to the top of the deck in the same order, or shuffle them into the deck. Draw a card.

name: Belsamoreth
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Forest Troll
Order: Once per turn, remove a wound from Belsamoreth.
“Not all trolls are evil. ‘Course, I wouldn’t go ‘round betting my life that I’d found one of the exceptions.” – Jack Casey

name: Black Journal
effect:
Only evil characters. This character is a Necromancer while the Black Journal is equipped.
“All things shall be as I command them. In this world, and the next.” – Tepheroth

name: Black Tom of Corinth
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Unique • Assassin
May start the game with rogues from other armies. Rogues joining this army have no loyalty penalty.
Spent React: After a character misses a character with a melee strike, the attacking character suffers one wound.
Never turn your back on a sharpened blade.

name: Blackwind
effect:
Mercenary • Unique • Dragon • Wyrmling
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Target an adjacent rank. All characters in the target rank must succeed with a magic save(DC14) or suffer one wound.

name: Blessed Vestments
effect:
Armor
+1 hit point.
“I did not know the stars not the sun before we came upground, and I did not need them. I had Kor’s word that they existed, passed down through Hember’s Rune. I need faith to know my world, and nothing else.” – Gnarrow Yaw

name: Bloodthirsty
effect:
React: Play after this fighter kills an opposing character with a melee strike. This fighter may immediately perform an additional melee strike with an ATK equal to the previous strike.
“Wherever these dwarves came from, we will send them back. In pieces.” – Uthanak

name: Blue Willow Staff
effect:
Weapon
React: Before a character in your army makes a magic save or poison save, spend the Blue Willow Staff to add +10 to the die roll.
“Forgiveness is an attribute of the strong.” – Zoe

name: Bracers of Ogre Power
effect:
This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits with a melee strike.
“I’ve never heard of the Tribe of Bears,” Maxmillian said. “Where do they live?” “They used to live in the lowlands,” Uther replied with a savage grin. “But not anymore.”

name: Breastplate
effect:
Armor • Fighter and cleric only.
-2 skill.
“Teaching someone to fight is easy. There’s only one lesson: Don’t die.” – Kerebrus

name: Breastplate of Power
effect:
Armor
Other characters gain +2 ATK and +2 AC while in the same rank as this character.
“Our sovereign Emperor commands, and we will do our duty. No rein can hold obedience forever.” – Lady Beatrix

name: Cador
effect:
Deverenian • Myerdeth
Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to perform a +4 ranged strike.
“I do not hate you, Euain. Hatred is a coward’s revenge. I will find thee, and make thee a truth not soon forgotten…”

name: Contagion
effect:
Necromancers play this without spending.
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character in the 1st Rank of another army. The next time target becomes spent, he or she suffers a wound (if this kills the target, any action the target is performing is canceled). The target's player may spend a cleric adjacent to the target to negate the wound.

name: Courage from Faith
effect:
Order: This cleric targets a stunned character. The target becomes spent.
“Yaw is brave,” she whispered. “But that does not make him less a fool. If he will not see the truth, then I will call upon King Xod to force withdrawal from the surface. We waste our time above while we are slaughtered below.”

name: Daedalia
effect:
Elf • Bard • Lady of Pain
After Daedalia enters play, draw a card.
“Such sweet music she makes of torture. Men die just to hear her play…” - Absinthe

name: Doombringer
effect:
Order: Spend Doombringer to target one or two characters that are up to 2 ranks away and adjacent to each other. Select the order of attack, then perform a +2 ranged strike against each target.
“I found it in an abandoned keep, guarded by three demons – must be worth something, but it wasn’t what I was looking for. You want it?” – Anton Cyldragen

name: Dragonscale Shield
effect:
Shield
This character may not perform multiple melee strikes.
Order: When in the first rank, spend the Dragonscale Shield to have it attack as a level 1 fighter with AC 10, 1 hit point, and as ATK of +3.

name: Duchess Brymin
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Unique
May start the game with fighters from other factions. Fighters joining this army suffer no loyalty penalty.
React: Once per turn, after Brymin kills a character with a melee strike, draw a card.
Destiny. A tyrant’s excuse for butchery, a coward’s excuse for failure. I will make my own path.

name: Dwarven Hammer
effect:
Weapon • Fighter and Cleric only.
The warhammer gives an additional +1 ATK while equipped by a Dwarf.
“The Deverenian city of Phrygai is a stone in our tomb, nothing more. If it keeps the Abyss at bay just one day more, then it was worth the lives we gave to seize it.” – Saul Tombcarver

name: Excellent Reflexes
effect:
React: Play before this character makes a skill check or magic save. Add +5 to the die roll.
“That’s how I’ve stayed alive so long.” – Basil Nemis

name: Experienced Archer
effect: React: Play after a fighter or rogue in your army kills another player's character of equal or higher level with a ranged strike. Attach this to your character. As long as this card is attached, the character is +1 level, +3 skill, and has the ability: "Order: Once per turn, perform a +3 ranged strike."

name: Far Shot
effect:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: Play before this character declares the target of a ranged strike. The target may be one additional rank away.
“That must have come as a nasty surprise,” Logan chuckled.

name: Fauve Mightyheart
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Bard
Spend Order: Target a player, who must select one of his or her ready characters. The selected character becomes spent.
“She fought her way through Elven lines to sing songs of courage, and tell us that Toris Kelt still stands. There is yet hope…” - Sir Robert

name: Flail
effect:
Weapon • Fighter, rogue or cleric only.
Melee strikes performed by this character ignore any AC bonus from Shields or Weapons.
“Logan led the Baraxton thieves; Black Tom is Master of the whole guild of Accordlands. I don’t want to know what they have against each other. It’d just lead to knives in dark alleys, and I’d rather stay alive.” – Basil Nemis

name: Handaxe
effect:
Weapon
Wounds inflicted from melee strikes by this character may not be reduced or negated.
“Rockhome, city nearest the mouth of the Abyss. She’s got two walls that surround her – one made of stone, and one of the bodies of the dead.” – Rac Ironbone

name: Havat-lahn Stance
effect:
This character gains an additional melee strike with an ATK of +1 (items and actions modify this strike normally.
The Duchess watched the Narawat gladiator defeat ten Deverenian fighters before they subdued him. Stepping forward, she picked up the man’s strangely bladed staff and returned it to him. “Teach me.”

name: Heart
effect:
Dwarf • Seer
React: After players roll initiative, kill Heart to add +10 to your roll.
I have seen the beasts of the Abyss, and I know their cruelty. Whatever you say of us, uplander, we know more of pain than you could ever understand.

name: Heavy Crossbow
effect:
Bow • Fighter and rogue only.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike that targets a character three ranks away.
“I carried the news of Baraxton to Sir Robert… and brought Darian his wife’s dagger. I’ve never seen a man’s heart break that way… like it was shattered into nothing but shards of glass.” – Jemman

name: Hechun
effect:
Nothrog • Summoner • Krun's Legion
Hechun may equip items as if he were a level 1 fighter.
Hate will hold Baraxton until the Storm comes or the world ends. Pray for the second.

name: Holy Symbol
effect:
Order: this cleric is +1 level until end of turn. Discard the Holy Symbol.
“Unless you believe, you shall not understand.” – Bishop Koenraad

name: Horn of Fog
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of turn, all characters have +5 AC versus ranged strikes.
Anandale glowered. “Blind their eyes, and thus cut the strings of their bows. ‘Tis an old trick, Gahid – likely why you did not think of it.”

name: Howl of the Wolves
effect:
Bard only.
Spend Order: Remove one wound from each character in the same rank as this bard (including the bard).
“Not all songs are written by humans.” – Darian Windson

name: I Call Forth Valor
effect: Spend Order: Name a character card and look at the top 7 cards of your deck (15 if this is wizard is a Summoner). If the named character is among those cards, you may immediately put one copy of him or her into play, as long as you can follow all the normal rules for bringing a character into play. Shuffle your deck.

name: Improved Initiative
effect:
Spend React: Play before initiative rolls. Your army gains +5 to its roll.
“True power comes in the moment before the strike. Use it well. Make them scream.” – Rora Blackmane

name: Insect Plague
effect:
Druid Only.
Spend Order: This druid targets a character up to two ranks away. All characters in the target’s rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or become stunned.
“Siege? No, Krun. There will be no more siege. By tomorrow, Baraxton will already be starving” – Taoth

name: Invisibility Potion
effect:
Discard the Invisibility Potion at the end of the turn or the next time this character performs a strike or action, whichever comes first.
“Elves do not know fear, Taraniel, but humans do. We must teach our brethren what they have been missing.” – Alia of Rowan

name: Invisible Servant
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Invisible servant gains +8 ATK, +8 AC, and +1 hit point while adjacent to a wizard of 3rd level or higher.
“You cannot kill what you cannot find” - Sorscha

name: Jack Casey
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Spend Order: Target and move a character in this rank forward or backward one rank.
“Never knew a Deverenian to have such a crush on a man. If she weren’t always trying to kill me, I’d be flattered.”

name: Jemman
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Baraxton Refugee
React: After Jemman hits a character with a melee strike, randomly select an item equipped by the target. The item is discarded.
My Life ended when the dream of a free Baraxton died. What is left I give to Robert, that he may do more with it than I ever did.

name: Kether
effect:
Elf • Scout • Rowan
Kether may not target ready characters with melee strikes.
“Best he does not tell the Queen where his true loyalties lie.” - Yanthorine

name: Keziah's Loris Daggers
effect:
Weapon
Order: Until the end of this turn, this rogue suffers a -3 ATK, then gains an additional melee strike equal to his or her highest ATK. This order can be performed once per turn.
“They were my father’s. He didn’t need them anymore – he had a whole kingdom of weapons to choose from.” – Keziah

name: Leadership
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, other characters gain +2 ATK and +2 AC while in the same rank as this fighter. If this fighter is a Paladin, those characters receive an additional +2 ATK and +2 AC (+4 total).
“How fares thy sister, Beatrix?” Gahid laughed cruelly. “Thou hast led her to ground with the dogs and the boars, and as she rots, she curses thee.”

name: Maakh
effect:
Nothrog • Ranger • Sniper
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
Kill a soldier, and one man suffers. Kill a king, and a nation bleeds.

name: Magheline
effect:
Elf • Druid
Order: Once per turn, target a stunned character. The target becomes spent.
All our pretty secrets, asleep in tombs of curling vine. We shall wake them…In time. In time.

name: Misearan Poison
effect:
Assassin only.
Order: Discard Misearan Poison to target a character in this rank. The next melee strike performed by the target this turn inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
“The taste of it is sweet, like wine or candy… but it burns away the stomach and leaves nothing but a gaping hole.” – Senek

name: Nemeseth
effect:
Elf • Tomb Guardian
If your Warlord is an Elf, Nemeseth may enter play in any rank of your army when you are putting him into play from your hand.
Awaken, Rathe. Your betrothed awaits, and your Queen has need of you.

name: Nightmist Cloak
effect:
+4 Stealth Skill
This rogue gains +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound while performing a melee strike against a spent character.
“I’ll take on Toath, Basil. She may be a shaman, but she doesn’t have eyes in the back of ‘er head!” – Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Orazhuk
effect:
Nothrog • Druid
Spend Order: Move forward or backward two ranks.
Spend Order: Target and move a character in your army forward or backward one rank.
Ambition can creep as well as soar.

name: Over the Top
effect:
Spend Order: Move this rogue forward or backward one rank. You may perform another Order immediately after this one.
Even a journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

name: Portable Hole
effect:
Order: Spend the Portable Hole to move this character forward or backward up to two ranks.
Order: Once per turn, discard an item equipped by this rogue to draw a card.

name: Premonition
effect:
Seer only.
Spend React: Play after another player plays an action card. The action is canceled and returned to the player’s hand. Until the end of the turn, action cards with that name may not be played.
“What you see must come to pass, Melaegrance. Nothing can save us from ourselves.” – Alhana

name: Prismatic Spray
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to three ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer one wound and be stunned.
“Now, I bid you, run. You strive against things impossible, and we have the better of you.” – Bruin Lenoire

name: Protection
effect:
Order: this cleric targets a character in your army. Until the end of turn, other players cannot target that character with actions. The character can be targeted with melee strikes.
“’Angus’? He has not earned that name. He was known as ‘Maul,’ but since the day he bargained with the Abyssals, his name is nothing at all.” – Gnarrow Yaw

name: Rac Ironbone
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Unique • Lord of Rockhome
Order: Until the end of the turn, Rac gains +4 ATK and his melee strikes inflict an additional wound. Rac suffers one wound. This ability is usable only once per turn.
Dwarves must be stronger than steel.

name: Rapid Shot
effect:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: Play after this character performs a ranged strike. This character performs an additional ranged strike with the same modifiers and effects as the previous strike. The additional strike receives a -2 to the die roll.

name: Rhydin
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
Rhydin had +4 AC while he is adjacent to one or more fighters.
“Come, victory, or come destruction! We shall no longer wait for thee”

name: Rhythm of Defiance
effect:
Bard only.
Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters (including the bard) gain +2 ATK and +1 AC while in the same rank as the bard.
“By th’Storm! Methinks we should declare war on them just to stop their noise!” – Sir Sorlons d’Ilchant

name: Robe of Eyes
effect:
Order: Spend the Robe of Eyes and discard a card to draw a card.
“They are Slayer’s looking glass and his mute witness, seeing the world through a thousand eyes and witnessing the atrocities preformed in the Empire’s name. So long as they don’t repent, and weep, he has no need of conscience.” – Sir Gahid

name: Rod of Resistance
effect:
+1 hit point.
“Anton says he’s an archaeologist, but I think that’s just a fancy way to say ‘tomb-looter’. He does find the darndest things, though…” – Sir Wallence

name: Rora Blackmane
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout • Bandit Queen
Spend React: After Rora enters play, she may perform a melee strike with a -2 penalty to the strike roll.
Make enemies deliberately, and kill them slowly. That’s what keeps it interesting.

name: Saul Tombcarver
effect:
Dwarf • Scout
After Saul enters play, you may kill a character in your army to give Saul +1 hit point permanently.
He climbs on the walls of the Abyss, seeking the bones of fallen dwarves. “I can’t leave them,” says Saul. “Would you so easily forget me?”

name: Scale Mail
effect:
Armor
Scale Mail gives an additional +2 AC versus ranged strikes.
“Sing of Kerebrus, Baudwyn, and let us see if cowardice by music can be dignified into honor.” – Princess Dashkova

name: Scry
effect:
Order: This cleric lets you look at the top two cards of any deck. If the cleric is a Seer, you may look at the top ten cards.
“All things are one, both future and past. All the world’s blood runs as a river through our veins, carrying our petty hatreds into a sea of strife.” – Toren Yscar

name: Sedwin Elfhunter
effect:
Elf • House Syneri
Whenever Sedwin kills a good character with a melee strike or action, he gains +1 skill permanently. Whenever Sedwin kills an Elf with a melee strike or action, he gains +1 level and +1 skill permanently. Sedwin's level cannot exceed 5 using this ability.

name: Senek the Poisoner
effect:
Mercenary • Assassin • Nightwalker
Whenever Senek hits a character with a melee strike, the character must succeed with a poison save (DC 11) or be killed.
“I saw Senek coat the inside of a Deverenian’s breastplate with a heat-poison. The man boiled to death inside his steel.” – Devon Harper

name: Shield of the Ancient Kings
effect:
Shield
This fighter may not perform more than one melee strike per turn.
Deep in a chasm below the Shattered Mountains, two humans crawled to freedom, the last survivors of more than forty soldiers. Something stirred beneath the earth… and its hunger had not been appeased.

name: Shot on the Run
effect:
React: Play after this rogue performs a ranged strike. Move the rogue forward or backward one rank.
“I’ve seen how Kerebrus marshals his forces to the south of Baraxton, keeping an eye on the war. Once an offer suits his fancy, he’ll move the mercenaries in… and we can only pray they’ll be on our side.” – Sali

name: Sir Delevere
effect:
Deverenian • Rellion
Whenever Delevere moves into your 1st rank, you may rearrange the position of all your 1st rank characters.
Our victories shall be taken o’er the bodies of the dead, and our right shall batten upon the wrongs we must perform.

name: Sky
effect:
Dwarf • Priest of Kor
Spend React: Perform before a Dwarf in your army makes a melee strike roll. If the strike hits,
the Dwarf inflicts an additional wound.
“He says he’ll find the support pillar one day, and climb up to touch the blue ceiling” – Ash

name: Sleep
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets either two level 1 characters or one level 2 character. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or become stunned.
“Sleep, but do not dream. Tonight will be a night of a thousand nightmares, and of a thousand knives.” – Sorscha

name: Speed of the Cheetah
effect:
Barbarian only.
Order: Move this barbarian forward or backward one rank.
Spend React: Play after this barbarian is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike. If moving back one rank will not create an illegal rank, the strike is canceled and this barbarian moves back one rank.

name: SS-saurth
effect:
Mercenary • Barbarian • Monster
SS-saurth may not equip Armor.
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike with an ATK of +3. Weapons equipped by SS-saurth are considered blank for this strike.
“He’s uglier than Brindle’s kiss and twice as foul, but at least he can fight” – Urg

name: Stalwart
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
If something causes Stalwart to become stunned, he is spent instead.
I will not falter. I will not fail.

name: Strength of Death
effect:
Necromancers play this as a 3rd level spell.
Order: Select a player and target a character in play. Until the end of the turn, the target character gains either an ATK or AC bonus (your choice) equal to the number of characters in the selected player's discard pile.
“We do not wear bones, human. We wear death. Soon you will know the difference.” – Cordeos

name: Tales of Blood and Fire
effect:
Bard only.
Order: All stunned characters in the same rank as this bard become spent.
“The kingdom of Miseris has made an alliance with the Nothrog, and turns its troops against the other human nations.” The bard’s eyes narrowed. “Now you know why I left.”

name: Taoth
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Unique • Shaman • Captain
Ranged Strikes performed by Taoth receive +4 to the die roll. Magic saves against spells cast by Taoth have a +3 DC.
Peace is a waste of time.

name: Tek and Ket
effect:
Mercenary
Tek and Ket are considered 2 characters for determining illegal ranks.
“I’m not telling you what we saw in that chasm, but we ain’t going back!”

name: Thunderhammer
effect:
Weapon
This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits with a melee strike.
Order: Spend the Thunderhammer to perform a +6 ranged strike.

name: Timmuk
effect:
Nothrog
Timmuk inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
I say we ally with the Elves. We want blood, they want bone. Perfect.

name: Tome of Champions
effect:
While the Tome is equipped, this character has +1 level, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.
“There is a certain law in each well-ordered stroke, each cut of blade and lift of shield. The first Emperor knew this, and his ancient journal is said to hold the secrets of such craft. Secrets to be valued beyond gold, an one could find them.” – Duchess Brymin

name: Tome of Divine Wisdom
effect:
While the Tome is equipped, this character has +1 level, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.
“Knowledge comes, but Wisdom lingers.” – Carved on the entrance to the City of Corinth

name: Tome of Shadows
effect:
While the Tome is equipped, this character has +1 level, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.
“The difference between me and you, Tom, is an understanding of honor,” snarled Logan. “You’re wrong, boy,” Black Tom grinned, sharpening his knife. “The difference is that I will still be alive in a year.”

name: Tome of the Archmage
effect:
While the Tome is equipped, this character has +1 level, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.
“It once belonged to Syneri, and in its pages are said to be the answers to the mysteries of life and death, and magic beyond reason. I have searched all my life for it, and one day it will be mine.” – Anton Cyldragen

name: Training at the Guild
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a skill check or magic save. Add +5 to the die roll.
“I hear that Rora is calling herself the Bandit Queen.” Keziah laughed, “Well, it’s nice to have ambition, I suppose.”

name: Tyren Ruskin
effect:
Mercenary • Priest of Neus • Andover
Spend React: After a character in this rank suffers wounds, reduce the wounds by one. Tyren suffers one wound.
The rumors have already begun, blaming King Michael of Andover’s death on the elves. But I am not so sure…

name: Urg
effect:
Nothrog • Bodyguard
React: Once per turn, after an adjacent character is targeted with a strike or ranged strike, make Urg the target instead.
“I serve Takh. He will forge a blade worthy of my father’s soul.”

name: Uriens the Defiant
effect:
Deverenian • War Mage
Uriens can equip one fighter item.
All Deverenian wizards must pass the Trial Perilous before they are granted their robes. Those who succeed are forever known by the means they defeated the test… and those who fail are not remembered at all.

name: Valorous Shield
effect:
Shield • Only good characters.
This character may not perform multiple melee strikes.
React: Spend the Valorous Shield before an evil character targets this character with a melee strike roll. The die roll is automatically a '1'.

name: Vampiric Touch
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character in another army, one rank away. The target suffers one wound. If this wizard is a Necromancer, he or she gains +1 hit point permanently.
Euian laughed. “Thy venom clamors of a jealous woman, Cador. Prithee, turn more thought to thy studies, and less to thy cowardice!”

name: Vital Spot
effect:
Assassin only.
React: Play before this Assassin makes a melee strike roll. Item cards do not add to the target's AC for this strike. Draw a card.
“Elves’ time on this world may be short, human, but you will not live to see us die…” – Hassimal

name: Vogurn
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid • Tribe of Stone
Spend Order: Target a rank in your army. Until the end of turn, all of your Free Kingdoms characters gain +4 AC while in that rank.
His people held their ground, and the Nothrog had to burn the villages around them. No man nor woman screamed, no child cried. They went to their gods in strength.

name: Vorpal Blade
effect:
Weapon • Fighter and Rogue only.
React: After this character rolls a natural '20' on a melee strike, kill the target of the strike.
“Always remember that Ablung was mad…” – The Archmage Syneri

name: Wall of Fire
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of turn, whenever a character in your army is targeted with a melee strike (but before the roll), the attacker must succeed with a magic save (DC 10) or suffer a wound.
“Nothrog weapons are impressive, but ultimately inferior. Let us see how they deal with Deverenian fire.” – Slayer

name: Wheel of Fate
effect:
Seers play this without spending.
Spend Order: Discard the remaining cards in your hand, then draw the same number of cards that you just discarded, plus one.
“Neus, grant me the courage to change what can be altered…” – Sir Robert

name: Whirlwind
effect:
Druids may play this as a 3rd level spell.
Order: This cleric targets a character in play. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or become stunned.
“Elven gods are not spirits that live in some dream world distant from our own. They are within us – our blood, our bone. To stay alive, we must appease them.” – Behlial

name: Whirlwind Attack
effect: Spend Order: If this rogue is in the 1st rank, the rogue targets every character in another army's 1st rank with a melee strike. The ATK of each strike is equal to the rogue's lowest ATK. Determine the order of strikes before performing the first strike.

name: Wythien
effect:
Elf • Ranger
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike
Spend Order: when Wythien is in a 1st rank, move him into a player's 1st rank. Wythien can spend as an Order to move forward or backward one rank while in an opposing rank. He can target and be targeted with melee strikes by characters 0 and 1 rank away.
